overview: Zimbabwean landmine clearers Shame and Cosimas, as well as medic Previous have been traveling to the other side of the world for years to clear mines in the British Falkland Islands. In the subpolar cold, between sand dunes and penguins, they defuse and blow up the legacies of a forgotten war.

production_companies.name: Hochschule für Fernsehen und Film München

tagline: "I'm the Man Who Brings Total Peace."
title: The Deminers
